quote_first: Trying to identify the key facts, Ethan was suddenly aware he was looking at the wall clock; it was
quote_last:
.
“Wait a minute. When did you hear about this?”
There was a tiny moment of hesitation. “The first news came in just before five.”
title: The Infinite Day
author: Chris Walley

quote_last: -40. Yseut arrives at ‘M. and S.’, puts through phone call.
title: The Case of the Gilded Fly
author: Edmund Crispin
